Package no.ntnu.idatt1005.foodi.view.utils

Class FontLoader

java.lang.Object
no.ntnu.idatt1005.foodi.view.utils.FontLoader
public final class FontLoader extends Object
Utility class for loading fonts. Utilises LoadUtils to get the path to the font directory.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Henrik Kvamme
